data.title: Careers
data.meta_description: Help change how the finance industry works and join the Bud team - view available career opportunities today.
data.text:
Team Share Idea Streamline Icon: https://streamlinehq.comteam-share-idea

Authenticity

Our team is made up of people from all walks of life who bring unique strengths, ideas and opinions. We embrace our differences as opportunities to expand our horizons and achieve our goals. We know our strengths, but equally our weaknesses, and aren’t afraid to admit when we’re wrong. Being humble and honest means we can do and be better.

team-meeting

Collaboration

For us, this extends beyond just communication, to our culture of sharing ideas and of working as a team, meaning we can build better things and deliver time and again. As a team, we pick each other up when things don’t go to plan and celebrate our victories together. We leave no one behind.

We know interviewing can be a daunting experience and we'll do our best to provide support and make the journey as smooth as possible. Our People and Talent Team will provide feedback and check-in with you at each stage of the interview process. If you need any additional support or adjustments at any stage of the hiring process, just let us know and we’re happy to help
